content.about: Adams Appraisal LLC provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Antique/modern furniture. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Chicago area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: John C.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Patricia M.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: David S.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

content.about: Kathleen Doyle / Antiquestor provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Antique/modern furniture. With Since May ’21 (ISA membership) experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Chicago area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Michael W.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

reviews.author: David D.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: James T.
reviews.content: Knowledgeable about antiques, though communication could have been better during the process.

content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Mid-Century Modern Furniture. With Since May ’21 (ISA membership) experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Chicago area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Michael S.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Sarah J.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Emily M.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Susan M.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Elizabeth W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.
